title: Message of Sympathy to President Jose Maria Moncada About the Earthquake in Nicaragua.
text:
I AM appalled at the catastrophe which has overwhelmed Managua and in my own name and that of the American Government and people I extend heartfelt sympathy to Your Excellency and the people of Nicaragua.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency General Jose Maria Moncada, President of Nicaragua, Managua, Nicaragua]
